channel.title: The Everyday Sanyasin
channel.description: Everyone can be a sanyasin! Experience for yourself Yogi Sean's simple, direct and powerful teachings in this brand new radio program from Personal Transformation Radio.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Everyday Sanyasin with Yogi Sean
channel.itunes:summary: Everyone can be a sanyasin! Experience for yourself Yogi Sean's simple, direct and powerful teachings in this brand new radio program from Personal Transformation Radio.
